originalText.text:
This is reposted after Hoffman "treated" my child. Damage is worse after 3 years.

I have evidence, assuming on other things.

– Refused to give diagnosis so that I could help. Did not provide info as “therapy” progressed. Offered terse comments like “he is OK.”
– Responses to child’s situation differed. Said things to avoid me, a legal co-parent. Saved emails to show deception.
–Hoffman met with ex and me and released confidential information child told him. Child would be appalled. I assume this also went on without me.
– Ex paid Hoffman. When I requested info, he deferred to ex. Hoffman said his lawyer advised him not to provide info without ex’s permission. You get the lie! I had joint custody. Is that malpractice or just breaking the law? Finally had an excuse that he was about to write to me AFTER I reported him to the state!
-  Mother pressured me to use Hoffman and I caved. An ongoing desire of mother to control. I assume she found out she could control Hoffman. I regret not doing better for child.
- Note: Most often the mother alienates. But I know situations where the father alienated. Either way, the alienator is commiting despicable behavior that will almost certainly impair the child.
– He was unprofessional on phone, including yelling at me!
– He would not agree to a meeting with me and child or including ex as well. Assume ex would not permit it. (Not assuming, he said as much.)
– 2 periods of treatment. Child refused to go after first. Child was manipulated, and I think threatened to go the second time. "Threat" can also be fear of lost "love." Mother had me help trick the child to go by driving him to subway at which point she forced him. My crime.
- Hoffman and mother asked me for time to treat child. A year later, the child got far worse. Though I told Hoffman, he kept saying otherwise, maybe hoping that repeated lies are believed.
- He prescribed many ADHD medications without my approval. Child did not like it and realizes that he was hurt by it.
–RESULT is that child has parental alienation. Hoffman had to see it, knew symptoms and, as I told him, symptoms got worse while child was seeing him. He denied it! I assume that he furthered the alienation. Professionals and articles say this is very damaging to children for life. It is heartbreaking to limit a child's life. How does a mother do this? To get at me?
- Do not subject your child to his abuse. Interview 3 MDs and 3 references each. Insist on regular written reports that BOTH parents receive. Move on if not agreed to. Once your child is eighteen, they go on with damage, and you hope they find their way.
-Ex HID 2 hospitalizations and three recent severe incidents! I believe relates to alienation Hoffman supported, issues not addressed, and his incompetence to recognize and diagnose the signs.
– Childs alienation impacts other issues. I do not have HIPAA permission and am told NOTHING about the child’s condition after very serious issues. I do not know if my child/adult is in trouble, alive, or how I can help!! WHY hide life-critical info? How do you justify hurting the child? What lies does mother tell people to appear "caring"? What manipulation, threats and lies alienated the child to revoke permission AFTER he GAVE it?
-The effect on the alienated parent approaches the death of a child I am told. It hurts terribly. I have been prevented from helping him. WHAT is the motivation of the alienating parent but to harm you through the child?
- This is not the relationship with my ex or Hoffman that supports a child and avoids the pain of a parental battle. Cooperation is key for a child’s growth or confusion ensues. A child, even past 18, is unlikely to be aware of influences over many years and may reject you. It is common for alienators to inject "memories" (brainwash) when a child is young. They do not know the reality or context. But often think they do.

– Parents, please get competent help! Go to court. DO NOT ALLOW YOUR CHILD TO BE ABUSED by Hoffman!

Do what is best for the child! Even if you are made to pay for it in some sick way.
